name: Secretary Outsource
tagline: Working with You, Taking Care of Business
description: Whether you're looking for admin help, expert project management or minute taking and shorthand skills we are ready to assist. We can help with everything from mailshots & mail merges to research, presentations to data entry, spreadsheets, office de-cluttering and databases. We can manage your dairy, carry out research, write copy, be your PA or help you with travel planning.
